definition: to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: Promoted to Year 2 of Higher Diploma in Human Resource Management, Tsing Yi Campus.
sentences.chinese: 升读青衣分校人力资源管理学高级文凭课程二年级。

sentences.english: Vicky: graduated from the Department of Administration in Chung I Hsing University.
sentences.chinese: 我从中兴大学的行政管理学系毕业。

sentences.english: The giants of management education have laboured mightily to bring forth a molehill.
sentences.chinese: 这些管理学教育界的巨头们实在是徒劳微功。

sentences.english: The way of public management of sexuality perhaps will shift from mopping up to regulation.
sentences.chinese: 性的公共管理学路向，将可能从扫荡走向管理。

sentences.english: Yunheng TONG, Deputy Dean of Economic and Management School, Tsinghua University.
sentences.chinese: 仝允桓，清华大学经济管理学院，副院长。

sentences.english: Business logistics management is a brandnew field of management study.
sentences.chinese: 商业后勤管理是管理学研究的新兴课题。

sentences.english: Tony received a Bachelor of Business Administration from Chinese University of Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 黄瀚泓毕业于香港中文大学，获得工商管理学士学位。

sentences.english: Objective management is advanced by Derek, a famous American manager.
sentences.chinese: 目标管理是美国著名管理学家德鲁克提出的。

sentences.english: She also works as the deputy director of Academic Programs Office at Guanghua School of Management, Peking University.
sentences.chinese: 她也是北京大学光华管理学院学术项目办公室副主任。

sentences.english: Many people have participated in my management semi- nars.
sentences.chinese: 许多人已经参加过我的管理学研讨会。

sentences.english: Not excited by a traditional degree in business administration or biology?
sentences.chinese: 对传统工商管理学位或生物学学位不感兴趣吗？

sentences.english: I make up my mind to study management in college.
sentences.chinese: 我下决心在大学里攻读管理学。

sentences.english: Jiang Peng Doctor of Law, Lecturer, Economy and Management School, Tsinghua University.
sentences.chinese: 姜朋，法学博士，清华大学经济管理学院讲师。

sentences.english: Professor Zhang Weiying, Dean, Guanghua School of Management, Peking University.
sentences.chinese: 张维迎教授，院长，北京大学光华管理学院。

sentences.english: Jiang Peng of Law, Lecturer of Tsinghua University, Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 姜朋，法学博士，清华大学经济管理学院讲师。

sentences.english: The Oxford Centre for Management Studies (OCMS) was founded in 1965.
sentences.chinese: 牛津大学管理学中心成立于1965年。

definition: business studies/commerce as an academic subject
